org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.subsample

Class SubsampleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<T>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.AbstractTask<DataSource>
        • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.subsample.SubsampleTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableFuture<DataSource>, Future<DataSource>, EvalTask<DataSource>

    public class SubsampleTask
extends AbstractTask<DataSource>
    The command to build and run a Subsample on the data source file and output the partition files
